
# Page 19: Step 10 - Targeted Adjustments

Apply specific corrections such as removing submission IDs or replacing values for selected records.

## What you will be asked

You will see a short prompt with a recommended default. Press Enter to
accept the default or provide a new value if you need to change it.

## Why this step matters

This step keeps your workflow consistent and makes the output easier to
share and reproduce across runs.

## Tips

- Use only when you have documented reasons
- Every change is written to the audit log
- Prefer targeted adjustments over manual editing
